text: Development of new pipeline of NGS Data, Unix, Python

text.1: This Jobot Job is hosted by Andrew Duong
text.2: Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
text.4: We are a Series C startup with new assay development on the horizon and we are utilizing cutting-edge molecular and automation technology to make global impact to help combat diseases & pathogens through the power of genomics. We are a seeking humble and ambitious individuals to help us achieve our goals and make great impact at scale with our work
text.5: We offer competitive pay, excellent benefits, flexibility, great office/lab amenities including catered food each week, and equity so you'll have a piece of the pie! We are a cohesive collaboration and as a team, achieve aggressive milestones & work together to reach the goals
text.6: Analyze large-scale datasets to gain insights into how to improve sensitivity and specificity of microbial detection assays
text.7: Analyze large-scale sequencing data to identify variants, SNPs and hypervariable regions to differentiate among microbes in clinical specimens
text.8: Curate microbial genomes from multiple databases
text.9: Utilize and/or develop software tools and pipelines for comparative genomics and phylogenetic analysis
text.10: Evaluate third-party analysis and visualization tools and libraries for integration into production-level analysis pipelines
text.11: Optimize and parallelize large-scale analyses in order to arrive more quickly at biologically meaningful solutions
text.12: Query custom databases to pull relevant datasets to address particular scientific questions.
text.13: Collaborate closely with the science and product teams to define product enhancements, spec technical requirements, develop project plans, and generate test cases.
text.14: Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
